Potential is endless, would make a great family home, could be an investment property for a single family rental or its walking distance to the University of Windsor. This is a turnkey property, vacant and ready for you to set the rents. This 2 storey brick home has 5 bedrooms (space to create 6th Bedroom), 2 full baths, large living room & a spacious dining area. Nice cement porch with beautiful views of the river, backyard for entertaining, driveway for a couple of cars, plus rear parking if needed. Newer furnace, egress window installed for the large bedroom in lower level, kitchenette could be converted into a 6th bedroom or a full 2nd kitchen. (50664617)

Listing Description
This J Rauti Custom Home in ""The Orchards"" of South Windsor offers luxury across all levels. Featuring a grand entrance, it includes a spacious mudroom, designer kitchen, open-concept dining and family room, and 5 large bedrooms with 3.5 bathrooms, including 2 primary ensuites. Highlights include a 2-car garage, walk-out basement, and a covered concrete patio off the kitchen. This home features a finished concrete driveway as well as a concrete sidewalk leading to the backyard. Finished with high-end touches throughout, this property is situated in a prime location near Devonshire Mall, with various models and designs available. Furthermore, potential homeowners have the flexibility to choose from other models and designs, tailoring their home to their specific tastes and needs. (50663487)
